slider.title: Get Your Appointment
slider.description: Contact us online by clicking Schedule Appointment or call our office. No referral is needed. Tele-visit is available. You can also schedule a FREE 10 minute consultation with the provider if you happen to be on the fence.

slider.title: Make your Visit
slider.description: Schedule an initial visit ~ 45 to 60 minutes. During this visit, we get to know each other and develop a plan.

slider.title: Follow Ups
slider.description: Follow-up visits ~ 30 minutes. We will monitor and modify the plan as needed based on your response. The frequency of follow-up visits can range from every week to every three months, depending on the phase of care and the nature of the medication involved.
